sentences.english: Cryptology was born among people, later circulated into the palace, and became popular among scholars.
sentences.chinese: 隱語產生於民間，後漸入宮廷，逐步士人化。

sentences.english: Learn the lingo of food claims.
sentences.chinese: 要清楚食品聲稱中的隱語。

sentences.english: Cant is an impersonal special language phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 隱語是一種客觀存在的特殊語言現象。

sentences.english: Entertainment places have been important places where contemporary argots are spread.
sentences.chinese: 娛樂場所已成爲當代隱語傳播的重要場合。

sentences.english: These images are symbolistic argots about realistic prospect of Chinese society.
sentences.chinese: 這些影像是關於中國社會現實圖景的象徵主義的隱語。

definition: variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
(textiles) to scour/to degum (silk)/variant of 精煉|精炼[jing1 lian4]
to comment/a point by point commentary
lit. to scratch the outside of the boot (idiom)/fig. beside the point/ineffectual
to make far-fetched claims (idiom)/to offer outlandish explanations
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
to mark a text with dots and circles/to punctuate
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
forged book/book of dubious authenticity/misattributed book/Apocrypha
